mapper.select: SELECT a.userID as userID, a.cartSeq as cartSeq, b.proSeq as proSeq, b.proName as proName, b.proPrice as proPrice, b.proBrand as proBrand, b.proImgPath as proImgPath FROM cart a INNER JOIN product b ON a.proSeq=b.proSeq WHERE a.userID=#{userID} AND a.proSeq=b.proSeq
SELECT SUM(a.proPrice) FROM product a INNER JOIN cart b ON a.proSeq= b.proSeq WHERE b.userID=#{userID}
